'''''No Place for Banditry''''' is a [[Daily Commission]] that occurs on [[Jinren Island]], [[Inazuma]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|A group of bandits has been sighted nearby, threatening the safety of the surrounding areas. Head over there and take them out.}}
# Defeat all opponents 0/7
:Wave 1 {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Jintouban*2;Nobushi: Hitsukeban/spawns after aggro is obtained;Nobushi: Kikouban/spawns after aggro is obtained}}
:Wave 2 (spawns after 3 enemies have been defeated) {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Jintouban;Nobushi: Hitsukeban;Nobushi: Kikouban}}

==Location==
<gallery>
No Place for Banditry Start Location.png|East of [[Jinren Island]]
</gallery>
